transcript: And I had this idea as I was watching them go down. There's one, everything was being destroyed, you know, but this one thing was being made. It was a kind of monument. It's kind of responsibility, you know, a man for man.

segments.text: And I had this idea as I was watching them go down.
There's one, everything was being destroyed, you know, but this one thing was being made.
It was a kind of monument.
It's kind of responsibility, you know, a man for man.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And I had this idea as I was watching them go down.  Everything was being destroyed, you know, but this one thing was being made.  It was kind of a monument, it's kind of responsibility, man for man.
